title: Pastoral Scene
credit_line: Gift of Miss Mary Helen Arthur
provenance_text:
David Gilmour Blythe [1815-1865]; Edmund Watts, Pittsburgh, PA, 1855?; Edmund W. Arthur, his grandson, 1911?; by descent to Mary Helen Arthur, Pittsburgh, PA, by 1971 [1]; gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, 1971. 
NOTES: [1] Mary Helen Arthur was the granddaughter of Edmund Watts. See collections committee meeting minutes of August 14, 1971 for more information.

creator.birth_place: East Liverpool (Columbiana county, Ohio, United States)
